Era Organics Moisturizing Face Wash

Brand: Era Organics

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Derived From Coconut), Decyl Glucoside, Propanediol (Derived From Corn Glucose), Leptospermum Scoparium (Manuka) Mel, Cehami (Centipeda Cunninghamii), Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Tapioca Starch, Xanthan gum, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Oil*,

Leptospermum Scoparium (Manuka) Mel, Cehami (Centipeda Cunninghamii), Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Tapioca Starch, Xanthan gum, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Oil*, Cellulose Gum, Mica & Titanium Dioxide, Benzyl Alcohol & Salicylic Acid & Glycerin & Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
